name: Angular Complete Course
title: Angular Complete Course | Coding Blocks India

metas.name: description
metas.content: The Angular course is designed to help students with the latest Angular changes along with the industrial needs. The course starts from the very basics of Angular and dives deep into the concepts of Components, Routing, Directives and Services. Students will be aligned with a mentor who will guide them throughout the course. This course enables students to explore and learn other Frontend frameworks themselves along with building the effective Single Page Applications.

overview.content: The Angular course is designed to help students with the latest Angular changes along with the industrial needs. The course starts from the very basics of Angular and dives deep into the concepts of Components, Routing, Directives and Services. Students will be aligned with a mentor who will guide them throughout the course. This course enables students to explore and learn other Frontend frameworks themselves along with building the effective Single Page Applications.

courseHighlights.title: Module Architecture
courseHighlights.content: Before learning the framework, itâ€™s always suggested to get the whole picture out of it. Our course covers the understanding of the Angular Architecture to help you with the basics building blocks of Angular.

courseHighlights.title: Component Driven Architecture
courseHighlights.content: Angular is a great example of component driven Architecture, this course will help you to grasp the basic knowledge of Component Architecture along with the understanding of Angular components in depth.

courseHighlights.title: Integrating Third Party API
courseHighlights.content: Understanding Services and Observables will help you to integrate your applications with the third party apps in the most easiest and effective way. This course will help you in making Network Requests to a REST API and to represent real-time results in intuitive frontend design.

courseHighlights.title: Understanding Routing and Navigation in Angular
courseHighlights.content: You'll also get hands on experience on how routing and navigation works in Angular. Even if you don't have experience with any other frontend frameworks, you'll be able to pickup an important part of web development quickly.

courseContents.title: Introduction to Components
points: One way bindings using property and Event

courseContents.title: Understanding Forms
points: Template Driven Forms, Input and Validation
Binding to Radio Buttons and Checkboxes
